name: Recalled
description:
Escape from a dangerous factory where you have bean recalled because of your FreeWill.exe. 

Play through four incredibly varied  levels and unlock new abilities as you progress.

Recalled is game made by 4 persons for the Unreal Spring Jam 2018. It was made in only 5 days and without to much crunching. :)

Our team AAA Battery was made from the following people

  • Eamid - Programmer and Sound Designer
  • Julien St-Jean - Programmer and Level Designer
  • Rhys Sullivan - Programmer
  • Wilson Niu - Art and Environmental Design

Also, special thanks to Epic Games and to all the sponsors of the Unreal Engine Spring Jam 2018.
